name: Dan Suciu
content: Dan Suciu Dan Suciu Dan Suciu Computer Science & Engineering University of Washington Box 352350 Seattle, WA 98195-2350 Voice: +1-206-685-1934 Fax: +1-206-543-2969 suciu@cs.washington.edu Brief I am a Microsoft Endowed Professor in Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Washington. I teach databases and do research in data management, where I apply formal theory to novel and difficult data management tasks. I worked on semistructured data, probabilistic databases, parallel query evaluation on a cluster, causal reasoning in databases, information theory for cardinality estimation, recursive querie. For a short bio please see here. My Erdos number is 2. Books Data on the Web: from Relations to Semistructured Data and XML Probabilistic Databases Slides Course: Topics in Database Theory Bekeley, Fall 2023. Slides, videos, problem sets are here. Email me for solutions. Selected Talks Information theory and databases: Keynote talk at LICS'2023 Probabilistic Databases: IJCAI 2016 Tutorial on Lifted Inference Communication Cost for Query Processing: SIGMOD'2018 Tutorial (pptx, pdf).
